item.title: 317 - Delta | Need help adding drops/changing drop rates
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Using a Delta source, I am aware of how terrible the drop rate system is on an unmodified Delta. It is absolutely garbage. If you want a legit drop rate system you’re going to need to change a lot of things. But nevertheless, you’ll find the drop rate system in your item3 class.

Read full topic
item.source: 317 - Delta | Need help adding drops/changing drop rates
